overview: This time, Kadir and Doyok play a couple of buddies who end up in prison  over and over again for various infractions of the law. Initially, they rob a bank, then they escape jail and are recaptured and sentenced for that too. The film fishes for laughs throughout, especially in scenes involving Rosa (Nyoman Ayu Lenora) as Doyokâ€™s girlfriend. At the end of the story, the two convict friends end up in prison again with absolutely no hope of further escapes.
title: Boleh Dong Untung Terus
